title: **DISCORD SERVER** IN NEED OF OCEANIA BUMP IN DISCORD SERVER

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
{{champion:67}} **Hey OCE Players! I'm here to discuss with you all this HUGE community server called Nightborn! **{{champion:67}} 
It's a community server that aims to join everyone from every other server/region to come together and enjoy ourselves in one single server, the server itself is league of legends based, but other games may be discussed also!
As of right now its mainly an **NA** based server, but seeing as I'm from our one and only **OCE**, I'd like to see more Oceanic players in so we can participate in inhouse brawls!
{{sticker:sg-jinx}} 
So come in alone and grab yourselves a mate as well, as you are rewarded with a in-server currency if you refer a friend
With the in-server currency you may purchase yourself some RP, rent yourselves a private voice chat room that **YOU** control yourselves!
Now with every other **LARGE** community server, There are some rules and regulations to keep the server tiptop and in good working order. 
{{sticker:sg-lux}} 
So please, I beg of you, Come join me in this community server where we can **PROVE** to the other regions that we do **ACTUALLY** exist!
**See you all there !**

_**Custom bots - Everyday Events - RP Giveaways - Prized League Tournaments btw**_
**_Enjoy your stay with us {{champion:19}} _**
From our very own,
**Toxic** {{item:2033}}
